## Description

[Monday](https://www.monday.com/) is a Cloud-based platform that allows companies to create their own applications and work management software.
The **Monday** component allows you to manage columns, items, and subscribers in a Monday board.

Monday offers a [GraphQL-based](https://graphql.org/) API.
This gives you flexibility and control over what data you send to Monday, and what data you request back.

While this component offers some actions that wrap common GraphQL queries and mutations, there are many more queries and mutations for which there aren't dedicated actions.
If you'd like to run a query or mutation that is not represented by an action, please use the [Generic Request](#genericrequest) action.

## Connections

### API Key

For testing purposes, you can use an **API key** to authenticate requests to the Monday GraphQL API.
You can configure a Monday Personal API token from your user admin settings.
For more information refer to the [Monday documentation](https://developer.monday.com/apps/docs/choosing-auth).
We recommend using OAuth when you deploy your integration to customers.

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      placeholder: "API Key",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments: "API Key",
      key: "apiKey",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "API Key",
    },
  ]}
/>

### OAuth 2.0

To configure OAuth 2.0 you will first need to [register a Monday app](https://developer.monday.com/apps/docs/oauth).
Ensure that the Composer Callback URL is added to the app in Monday.

Now you will need to add the Monday component's **OAuth 2.0** connection to your integration and configure it with:

- For **Client ID** and **Client Secret** enter the values that you got from your Monday app.
- For **Scopes** refer to [Monday's OAuth 2.0 documentation](https://developer.monday.com/apps/docs/oauth#set-up-permission-scopes).

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      placeholder: "Authorize URL",
      required: true,
      shown: false,
      comments: "The OAuth 2.0 Authorization URL for Monday",
      key: "authorizeUrl",
      type: "string",
      default: "https://auth.monday.com/oauth2/authorize",
      label: "Authorize URL",
    },
    {
      placeholder: "Client ID",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments: "Client Identifier of your app for Monday",
      key: "clientId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Client ID",
    },
    {
      placeholder: "Client Secret",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments: "Client Secret of your app for Monday",
      key: "clientSecret",
      type: "password",
      default: "",
      label: "Client Secret",
    },
    {
      placeholder: "Scopes",
      required: false,
      shown: true,
      comments:
        "Space separated OAuth 2.0 permission scopes for Monday. See https://developer.monday.com/apps/docs/oauth#set-up-permission-scopes.",
      example: "me:read boards:read",
      key: "scopes",
      type: "string",
      default:
        "account:read assets:read boards:read boards:write me:read notifications:write tags:read teams:read updates:read updates:write users:read users:write webhooks:write workspaces:read workspaces:write",
      label: "Scopes",
    },
    {
      placeholder: "Token URL",
      required: true,
      shown: false,
      comments: "The OAuth 2.0 Token URL for Monday",
      key: "tokenUrl",
      type: "string",
      default: "https://auth.monday.com/oauth2/token",
      label: "Token URL",
    },
  ]}
/>

## Actions

<div id="archiveboard" />

### Archive Board

Delete the information and metadata of a board by Id | <small><b>key: archiveBoard</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide the unique identifier of the board",
      key: "boardId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Board ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "archive_board": {
      "id": "4277545378"
    }
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="createboard" />

### Create Board

Create a new board inside your Monday account | <small><b>key: createBoard</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      example: "public",
      model: [
        {
          label: "Public",
          value: "public",
        },
        {
          label: "Private",
          value: "private",
        },
        {
          label: "Shareable",
          value: "shareable",
        },
      ],
      comments: "Provide a string value for the kind of board.",
      key: "boardKind",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Board Kind",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide a string value for the name of the board.",
      key: "boardName",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Board Name",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "Provide the unique identifier of the folder.",
      key: "folderId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Folder ID",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        "Provide the unique identifier of the template that your board extends.",
      key: "templateId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Template ID",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "Provide the unique identifier of the workspace.",
      key: "workspaceId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Workspace ID",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "create_board": {
      "id": "4277545378"
    }
  }
}
```

<div id="genericrequest" />

### Generic GraphQL Request

Issue any GraphQL query or mutation with variables | <small><b>key: genericRequest</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      language: "graphql",
      key: "query",
      type: "code",
      default: "{\nme {\nid\nemail\n}\n}",
      label: "Query or Mutation",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      key: "variables",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Variables",
    },
    {
      language: "json",
      required: false,
      key: "variablesObject",
      type: "code",
      default: "",
      label: "Variables Object",
    },
  ]}
/>

<div id="getboard" />

### Get Board

Get the information and metadata of a board by ID | <small><b>key: getBoard</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide the unique identifier of the board",
      key: "boardId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Board ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "boards": [
      {
        "id": "2924980809",
        "name": "H2 Kickoff",
        "state": "active",
        "board_folder_id": null,
        "columns": [
          {
            "title": "Name",
            "type": "name"
          },
          {
            "title": "Person",
            "type": "multiple-person"
          },
          {
            "title": "Status",
            "type": "color"
          },
          {
            "title": "Date",
            "type": "date"
          }
        ],
        "creator": {
          "id": 32002207
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

<div id="getitemsbycolumnvalue" />

### Get Items By Column Value (Deprecated)

Fetch items that have a certain column value. This version of the action is being deprecated. Please replace action with Get Items By Column Value (Latest) | <small><b>key: getItemsByColumnValue</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide the unique identifier of the board",
      key: "boardId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Board ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "status",
      comments:
        "Provide the ID of the column. For possible values see https://developer.monday.com/api-reference/reference/column-types-reference#supported-columns.",
      key: "columnId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Column ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "The column's value to search items by",
      key: "columnValue",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Column Value",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "items_by_column_values": [
      {
        "id": "4277581981",
        "name": "Task 1",
        "creator": {
          "email": "example@email.com"
        },
        "updated_at": "2023-04-10T16:23:17Z",
        "state": "active",
        "column_values": [
          {
            "id": "numbers",
            "text": "1234",
            "title": "Some Numbers",
            "value": "\"1234\"",
            "description": null,
            "type": "numeric"
          },
          {
            "id": "item_id",
            "text": "4277581981",
            "title": "Item ID",
            "value": null,
            "description": null,
            "type": "pulse-id"
          },
          {
            "id": "text",
            "text": "Hi There",
            "title": "Text",
            "value": "\"Hi There\"",
            "description": null,
            "type": "text"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

<div id="getitemsbycolumnvaluenew" />

### Get Items By Column Value (Latest)

Fetch items that have a certain column value | <small><b>key: getItemsByColumnValueNew</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide the unique identifier of the board",
      key: "boardId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Board ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "status",
      comments:
        "Provide the ID of the column. For possible values see https://developer.monday.com/api-reference/reference/column-types-reference#supported-columns.",
      key: "columnId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Column ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "The column's value to search items by",
      key: "columnValue",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Column Value",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "If turned off, a maximum of 500 items will be returned.",
      key: "getAllItems",
      type: "boolean",
      default: false,
      label: "Get All Items",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "items_by_column_values": [
      {
        "id": "12345678912",
        "name": "task #1",
        "creator": {
          "email": "example@email.com"
        },
        "updated_at": "2024-02-23T15:23:39Z",
        "state": "active",
        "column_values": [
          {
            "id": "person",
            "text": "John Doe",
            "column": {
              "description": null,
              "title": "Person"
            },
            "type": "people",
            "value": "{\"personsAndTeams\":[{\"id\":12345678,\"kind\":\"person\"}]}"
          },
          {
            "id": "status",
            "text": "Working on it",
            "column": {
              "description": null,
              "title": "Status"
            },
            "type": "status",
            "value": "{\"index\":0,\"post_id\":null,\"changed_at\":\"2019-03-01T17:24:57.321Z\"}"
          },
          {
            "id": "date4",
            "text": "2022-07-12",
            "column": {
              "description": null,
              "title": "Date"
            },
            "type": "date",
            "value": "{\"date\":\"2022-07-12\",\"icon\":null,\"changed_at\":\"2022-07-11T20:27:58.362Z\"}"
          },
          {
            "id": "text",
            "text": "This is a text column",
            "column": {
              "description": null,
              "title": "Text"
            },
            "type": "text",
            "value": "\"This is a text column\""
          },
          {
            "id": "country",
            "text": "United States",
            "column": {
              "description": null,
              "title": "Country"
            },
            "type": "country",
            "value": "{\"changed_at\":\"2024-02-23T15:23:39.043Z\",\"countryCode\":\"US\",\"countryName\":\"United States\"}"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

<div id="listboards" />

### List Boards

List all available boards in your Monday account | <small><b>key: listBoards</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        "Provide an integer value for the maximum amount of results that will be returned. Provide a value from 1 to 1000.",
      example: "20",
      key: "limit",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Result Limit",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        "Provide an integer value for the page offset for the given object's results.",
      example: "3",
      key: "page",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Page Offset",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "boards": [
      {
        "id": "2924980809",
        "name": "Example Board",
        "state": "active",
        "board_folder_id": null,
        "creator": {
          "id": 32002207
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
